ygData.subject: Re: Armadillo Hide
ygData.msgSnippet: ... never before seen. It was called Dunedigger and it looked like a huge armadillo. After dispatching it, it yielded up an armadillo hide. Does anyone know
ygData.messageBody:
>Last night on the dunes of North Ro my group and I vanquished a foe I had
never before seen. It was called Dunedigger and it looked like a huge
armadillo. After >dispatching it, it yielded up an armadillo hide. Does
anyone know of a use for it? Perhaps a type of armor? Any help would be
greatly appreciated.

Dunedigger is a very rare spawn in N Ro. He very rarely drops a special
shield called a Scute shield which is amazing and in high demand. I hadn't
heard of him dropping anything else... no idea what to do with armadillo
hide.

As a side note... if you are replying please only quote what you are
replying too... and especially if you reply to the digest. It's very
frustrating having to wade through a post which quotes an entire digest to
get a couple lines of message...

Thanks,
Geran
